translations.hero_content: Get found by new clients wherever you are
translations.step_search_description: Find the perfect professional for your needs. Explore detailed profiles to make the right choice.
translations.form.errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
translations.form.errors.invalidPassword: Password must be 8-16 characters long and include at least one digit, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and one special character.
translations.popup.userIdMissing: User ID is missing. Please try again.
translations.generic_errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
translations.popup.signupDescription: Check your email to confirm the registration.
translations.popup.reset_password_description: Check your email and follow the link to reset the password for your user
translations.form_update_password-description: To continue, enter a new password
translations.popup.update_password_description: Password updated successfully. Log in to your account.
translations.form_reset_password-description: To continue, enter the email address associated with your account.
translations.desc_about: Learn who we are, our history, and the mission that drives us every day.
translations.desc_services: Explore all our professional services designed to meet your needs.
translations.desc_contact: Contact us for information, support, or a personalized quote.
translations.desc_login: Log in to your account to manage your data and access our services.
translations.desc_signup: Sign up to start using all the features available on our platform.
translations.desc_dashboard: Access your personal area to monitor activities and manage your profile.
translations.desc_preview: Quickly and securely preview private content before publishing.
translations.desc_reset: Reset your password easily and securely to regain access.
translations.desc_update: Update your password to ensure your account's maximum security.
translations.main_services_description: Indicate up to 3 services you offer and your level of expertise as a percentage.
translations.main_contact_description: Enter your personal details, your qualification, and a brief description to introduce yourself to potential clients.
translations.main-channel_description: Add your digital profiles for greater visibility.
